docs.snippet: AT frequent intervals during the last year or two a young, unknown actress has been skipping onto the world stage and stealing the spotlight from her elders. Most of the other players knew her only by name. Most of the audience knew her not at all....
docs.lead_paragraph: AT frequent intervals during the last year or two a young, unknown actress has been skipping onto the world stage and stealing the spotlight from her elders. Most of the other players knew her only by name. Most of the audience knew her not at all. But whoever she might be, one thing was clear. She was nobody's understudy.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Dec. 4. -- President Roosevelt's triumphal (there is no other word to describe it) tour of South American capitals on the Atlantic Coast has tended to obscure the initial work of the Conference for the Maintenance of Peace scheduled to...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Dec. 4. -- President Roosevelt's triumphal (there is no other word to describe it) tour of South American capitals on the Atlantic Coast has tended to obscure the initial work of the Conference for the Maintenance of Peace scheduled to meet here for some three weeks longer.

docs.snippet: Trading in the foreign exchange market last week was uneventful in the matter of volume and rate variations. The demand which was small and came chiefly from commercial interests made for a firm undertone.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Dec. 7. -- The European armament race weighed down hope tonight of approval of an American arms limitation agreement at the Inter-American Peace Conference.

docs.snippet: A broad advance in South American dollar bonds, a belated recognition of the effect of the Buenos Aires Peace Conference featured the trading in bonds yesterday on the New York Stock Exchange. New high prices were recorded for many Latin-American...
docs.lead_paragraph: A broad advance in South American dollar bonds, a belated recognition of the effect of the Buenos Aires Peace Conference featured the trading in bonds yesterday on the New York Stock Exchange. New high prices were recorded for many Latin-American issues, regardless of their position in respect to partial or total interest default.

headline.main: SOUTH AMERICANS LEAD RISE IN BONDS; New High Prices Made by Some Issues, Regardless of Their Interest Position. FEDERAL LIST IS QUIET Traders Mark Time Awaiting the Allotments on New Loan -- Second Grade Rails Up.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Dec. 9. -- A hook-up between the Inter-American Conference for the Maintenance of Peace and the Chaco Peace Conference was effected today when a session of the latter was attended by the chiefs of the delegations of the six American...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Dec. 9. -- A hook-up between the Inter-American Conference for the Maintenance of Peace and the Chaco Peace Conference was effected today when a session of the latter was attended by the chiefs of the delegations of the six American States that are acting as mediators in the Chaco negotiations.
docs.abstract: peace conf, Buenos Aires; chiefs of delegations to Pan-Amer peace conf attend; U S opposes injecting issue into Pan-Amer conf

headline.main: CHACO AID PUSHED AT BUENOS AIRES; Chiefs of the Inter-American Delegations of 6 Mediating States Attend Session. BOTH SIDES ARE CALLED IN Paraguayan Foreign Minister Is Summoned to City -- U.S. Is Against Injecting Issue.
